title: Jess Cartner-Morley on fashion: So long, sequin kaftan! The holiday wardrobe is all about sleek, muted neutrals
description: The vacation aesthetic is now altogether more low-key. Take a deep breath and put those fringed palazzo pants downDoes your kaftan have a sequin trim? Adorable! Does your holiday tote bag have a shell bag charm? Cute. Does your maxidress have pom-poms dangling from it? Um, OK, I’m sure it’s lovely, but let’s take a moment here, shall we? Are you completely sure you need to coordinate your beach jellies with your candy-striped shorts and cropped top? Look, I’m going to come out and ask the question here. Have our holiday wardrobes got a bit … overexcited?I don’t want to be a killjoy. But there is a fine line between a cheerful holiday aesthetic and looking as though you bought the entire contents of your suitcase while on a sangria-fuelled shopping spree at Gatwick. Beguiling though all this stuff is, there is a point where tomato-print sundresses and sandals with ric-rac lacing stop looking delightfully Dolce, and start looking a tiny bit overwrought. Take a deep breath and put those fringed palazzo pants down. Continue reading...
author: Jess Cartner-Morley

title: Demna bows out at Balenciaga with star-studded final show in Paris
description: At times controversial fashion designer used show as study for ‘La Bourgeoisie’ before move to Gucci in MilanKim Kardashian modelling an off-shoulder fake mink coat inspired by Elizabeth Taylor. Nicole Kidman and Kyle MacLachlan nattering on the front row. And an appearance from Mrs Bezos herself.The stars were always going to align in Paris for Demna’s final show at Balenciaga. And on Wednesday lunchtime, the most controversial and copied designer in modern fashion bowed out after a decade with a show that conformed to the idea of couture as much as it challenged it. Continue reading...
author: Morwenna Ferrier in Paris

title: Citizen Watches Men Swear By for Style and Value in 2025
description: I’d like to start this article by giving props to Citizen. I’ve always seen them as a brand for the people. They’re not quite high-end (although their performance would suggest otherwise), yet they don’t try to be. They seem to be quite content in providing seriously decent watches (I’m talking vintage impressive) at an uber-affordable … Continue reading Citizen Watches Men Swear By for Style and Value in 2025 →

title: The 18 Best Matching Sweatsuit & Lounge Sets To Live In Year-Round
description: As much as we love diving headfirst into the latest fashion trends, there’s no denying the magnetic pull of a matching sweatsuit or lounge set. They’re cozy, they’re comfy, they’re cute — and, when made with quality and care, they’re built to last. Plus, the versatility. Toeing the line between sporty athleisure and polished co-ords, sweatsuits are the ultimate shortcut to looking casual yet put-together. Throw one on when you can't be bothered to style an outfit. Or default to your favorite when tackling a week’s worth of chores in a few hours. Working remotely and need to feel slightly more “dressed” than your pajamas? Problem solved. And on travel days? Sweat sets are an MVP for curling up on chilly flights. Bonus: You can break up a set and wear each piece separately, unlocking endless mix-and-match potential for those moments when you actually want to plan an outfit.If you’re ready to retire those ratty, holey sweats that have seen you through college and countless days under your duvet (no judgment — we’ve all got that pair), consider yourself covered. Ahead, discover 18 top-quality, stylish sweatsuit sets from retailers we love and trust. Whether you’re looking for lightweight short sets and breathable cotton co-ords for warm weather or weighty and more structured layers for indoor hibernation mode, you’ll find your new go-to right here.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.LululemonA Lululemon set for travel just makes sense. The plush fleece, roomy fit, and pockets make it practical yet undeniably cozy on early-morning flights — no wonder these are an internet sensation. Plus, the pants come in short, regular, and tall sizes, making the set even more versatile.Lululemon Scuba Oversized Full-Zip Hoodie, $, available at LululemonLululemon Scuba Mid-Rise Oversized Jogger, $, available at LululemonFree-est We’re long-time fans of Free People’s lounge and activewear offerings (especially FP Movement and Free-est), and this knit set is a standout. Available in 10 colors, from easy neutrals to pretty pastels, it’s perfect for everything from at-home happy hour to beach days.free-est Malibu Solid Surf Set, $, available at Free PeopleQuinceA highly searched and top-rated set by Quince that we love in airy white, but also comes in four other shades.Quince SuperSoft Fleece Crew, $, available at QuinceQuince SuperSoft Fleece Cropped Wide Leg Pants, $, available at QuinceNegativeIf you haven’t tried Negative’s ready-to-wear, it’s time. Their layering tees are perfection, but when it comes to matching sweats, this ballet pink waffle set is choice. It even comes with a coordinating bra.Negative Waffle Knit Pullover, $, available at NordstromNegative Waffle Knit Jogger, $, available at NordstromNegative Waffle Knit Lounge Bralette, $, available at NordtromGapReaders have been loving Gap’s sweats of late, and these heather gray coordinates make everything from WFH sessions to grocery runs and travel days a little cozier. Gap VintageSoft Wedge Crewneck Sweatshirt, $, available at GapGap VintageSoft Baggy Wide-Leg Sweatpants, $, available at GapOld Navy Don’t come for us by being utterly obsessed with ‘90s brown tones like this “black coffee” hue.Old Navy Half-Zip Bounce Fleece Pullover Sweatshirt, $, available at Old NavyOld Navy High-Waisted Bounce Fleece Jogger Sweatpants, $, available at Old NavyDaily PracticeGet your country club aesthetic on in this teal blue set from Anthropologie’s best-selling lounge line.Daily Practice Cotton-Blend Graphic Hoodie, $, available at AnthropologieDaily Practice Cotton-Blend Graphic Sweatpants, $, available at AnthropologieHollisterGray sweats feel anything but drab when literally tied with a pretty-in-pink satin bow.Hollister Off-the-Shoulder Tie Sweatshirt, $, available at HollisterHollister Star Graphic Fleece Mini Shorts, $, available at HollisterZara Swingy shapes in dusty pink scream low-key beach day to us, yeah?Zara Washed Sweatshirt, $, available at ZaraZara Washed Effect Pants, $, available at ZaraLunya Consider us in when reversible is part of the equation. And this powder blue? So fresh for summer.Lunya Midweight Reversible Cropped Sleeve Sweatshi, $, available at LunyaLunya Silksweats Midweight Reversible Short, $, available at LunyaEdiktedGirly bows and butter yellow?  We couldn’t click “add to cart” fast enough.edikted Bonney Bow Oversize Hoodie, $, available at Nordstromedikted Bonney Bow Detail Sweatpants, $, available at NordstromH&MYou just can’t beat a melange gray sweatsuit in rotation, any time of year.H&M 2-piece Sweatsuit, $, available at H&MAritziaOf course, everyone's favorite shop for wardrobe basics has hoodies that "hoodie" better than most in existence. The Cozy Fleece fabric is like wearing a cloud, and this pale pink? So adorable.Aritzia Cozy Sweatfleece Perfect Hoodie, $, available at AritziaAritzia Cozy Sweatfleece Perfect Hi-rise Mini Short, $, available at AritziaLou & Grey Sun-faded shades epitomize summer — this rosemary set is an especially great pick if you’re not into punchier tones.Lou & Grey Washed Cozy Cotton Sweatshirt, $, available at LOFTLou & Grey Washed Cozy Cotton Straight Leg Sweatpants, $, available at LOFTAviator NationWe love a summer stripe, especially in zippy neon.Aviator Nation 5 Stripe Relaxed Zip Hoodie, $, available at ShopbopAviator Nation 5 Stripe Sweatpants, $, available at ShopbopSplendidFound: your ultimate set for seaside days.Splendid Zip Up Stripe Hoodie, $, available at ShopbopSplendid Stripe Terry Shorts, $, available at ShopbopJenni KayneJenni Kayne — a.k.a. everyone's favorite luxury knitwear designer —  brings the same softness to the label’s matching sweat sets. This one is the definition of low-key luxury.Jenni Kayne Saturday Sweatshirt, $, available at Jenni KayneJenni Kayne Saturday Sweatpant, $, available at Jenni KayneLike what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?14 Comfy Sweatpants R29 Editors & Readers Swear ByBest Free People Summer Co-Ords & Matching SetsThese Lululemon Pieces Make Perfect Travel Outfits
author: Esther Newman

title: Wedding Guest Dresses From Amazon To Shop During Prime
description: Wedding season is officially here, so odds are you have one coming up soon. That calls for dress shopping! If you have multiple celebrations on your social calendar and can’t bear shopping around at several retailers, there’s a one-stop online shop to make wedding guest dressing easier: Amazon. Whether you're looking for an affordable and versatile dress that’ll take you from party to party or a luxury find that no one will guess that you snagged from Amazon, the retailer has all your summer wedding guest dress needs covered. From effortlessly-chic slip dresses and casual minis to on-trend halter necklines and beach wedding-ready maxis, Amazon offers styles for every dress code and budget. Click through to shop some of our favorite finds (some of which are on sale during Prime Day) to help make shopping (slightly) less stressful and get you on the best-dressed guest list.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. author: Victoria Montalti

title: 28 Editor-Loved Amazon Prime Day 2025 Fashion Deals, Like Kendall Jenner's $9 Tank
description: Fashion connoisseurs, rejoice. Amazon Prime Day is officially here. From now through July 11, shoppers can take advantage of some of the year's biggest deals - including markdowns on bestselling styles like handbags, leggings, everyday sneakers, and more. As shopping experts, we're essentially always tuned into Amazon's best deals and markdowns - from savings on cult-favorite beauty products to price drops on Amazon's most coveted home essentials and discounts on top-rated wellness products. And of course, we sorted through hundreds of Amazon Prime Day fashion deals to curate the best and help you better sort through all the madness, including Kendall Jenner's favorite Hanes tank top and the best jeans from Levi's. FYI: these fashion deals are going fast, so you'll want to keep your credit card handy and act quickly. Our Favorite Amazon Prime Day Fashion Deals to Shop Kendall Jenner's favorite tank top: Hanes Ecosmart Cotton Tank at $9, originally $11 The perfect high-waisted leggings (with pockets!): Satina High Waisted Leggings With Pockets at $14, originally $18 The perfect pair of summer slides for less than $30: Cushionaire Feather Slides at $19, originally $35 An editor-approved bestselling necklace: Kendra Scott Elisa Pendant Necklace at $47, originally $70 The white sneaker of all white sneakers: Reebok Classic Leather Sneakers at $45, originally $80 Keep scrolling to shop our top Prime Day sale picks, and be sure to sign up for Amazon Prime so that you don't miss a moment of the action. Looking for more deals? Check out PS's editor-curated Prime Day sale picks and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations. Update on July 9, 2025 at 5:45 PM ET: Updated prices and checked stock for all products.
author: Naomi Parris

title: 15 Fashion Bestsellers From Nordstrom Our Editors Suggest Grabbing ASAP
description: As shopping editors, we know all the best secrets for navigating Nordstrom's site to find standout styles (and even better deals). It's our job to uncover top-rated products, and Nordstrom certainly doesn't disappoint. Right now is a great time to score some of the brand's most popular pieces at prices you'll love - especially the ones on sale. If you find yourself in the market to update your closet with a new clothing item or even a top-rated pair of shoes, we have more than a few suggestions. We've curated products that are not only trending, but included in our own personal favorites as well, with many being highly discounted. Below, we've laid them all out for you - because, after all, what are shopping fairy godmothers for? Nordstrom recently released tons of new products under $50 to the sale section that are sure to sell out quickly, plus a few cult-favorite pieces that are hard enough to find in stock. From a top-rated swimsuit to stylish dresses and editor-loved sunglasses, these pieces are designed to live in your closet for the longterm - even as they endure multiple trend changes and TikTok aesthetics. Check out the best Nordstrom clothes and accessories that customers are currently loving from the retailer ahead, and buy them before they're gone.
author: Kyley Warren
